---
title: "Data wrangling for change in Black population"
output: html_document
date: "2025-07-28"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
tract_zip_xwalk <- read.csv("TRACT_ZIP_032025.csv")
```

```{r}
#Percent change in black population
change_black <- read.csv("race_percent_change.csv")
```

```{r}
change_black$GEOID <- as.character(change_black$GEOID)
tract_zip_black <- tract_zip_xwalk %>%
  left_join(change_black, by = c("TRACT" = "GEOID"))
```

```{r}
tract_zip_black <- tract_zip_black %>% filter(USPS_ZIP_PREF_STATE == "NY") %>% drop_na()
```

```{r}
write.csv(tract_zip_black, "percent change black with zip.csv")
```
